txt.en:
Girgish, the Haradrim are growing bolder. The rumours of the caravans heading south coming under attack are true. At least two have been ransacked or destroyed. The passengers and driver are now hostages.

We must organize a party to infiltrate their camp and rescue as many as possible. My contacts warn me that there are between four to twelve citizens taken. There is no estimate of the value of goods stolen.

We need your patron's assistance soon, lest we be overrun and lose all we have gained here in Jax Phan√¢l.

- Nimish
